requests.name: list_tasks
requests.description: List and search tasks with optional filters

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 10)

requests.name: get_task
requests.description: Get a single task by its ID

requests.name: create_task
requests.description: Create a new task

requests.name: update_task
requests.description: Fully update an existing task (replaces all fields)

requests.name: patch_task
requests.description: Partially update a task (only specified fields)

requests.name: delete_task
requests.description: Delete a task by its ID

parameters.name: task_id
parameters.description: The unique task ID to delete

requests.name: list_events
requests.description: List and search calendar events with optional filters

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

requests.name: get_event
requests.description: Get a single event by its ID

requests.name: create_event
requests.description: Create a new calendar event

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Event start time in ISO 8601 format (e.g., 2026-01-22T10:00:00Z)

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: Event end time in ISO 8601 format

parameters.name: all_day
parameters.description: Whether this is an all-day event

requests.name: update_event
requests.description: Fully update an existing event

requests.name: patch_event
requests.description: Partially update an event

requests.name: delete_event
requests.description: Delete an event by its ID

parameters.name: event_id
parameters.description: The unique event ID to delete

requests.name: list_reminders
requests.description: List and search reminders with optional filters

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

requests.name: get_reminder
requests.description: Get a single reminder by its ID

requests.name: create_reminder
requests.description: Create a new reminder

parameters.name: remind_at
parameters.description: When to trigger the reminder in ISO 8601 format

requests.name: update_reminder
requests.description: Fully update an existing reminder

requests.name: patch_reminder
requests.description: Partially update a reminder

requests.name: delete_reminder
requests.description: Delete a reminder by its ID

parameters.name: reminder_id
parameters.description: The unique reminder ID to delete

requests.name: list_people

requests.name: create_person
requests.description: Create a new person/contact

parameters.name: relationship

requests.name: update_person
requests.description: Fully update an existing person

requests.name: patch_person
requests.description: Partially update a person

requests.name: delete_person
requests.description: Delete a person by their ID

parameters.name: person_id
parameters.description: The unique person ID to delete

requests.name: search_all
requests.description: Search across all entity types using semantic search

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: Array of entity types to search (default: all)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 10)

requests.name: search_simple
requests.description: Simple search across all entity types via query parameters

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of entity types to search (e.g., task,event,person)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 10)

requests.name: health_check
requests.description: Check if the API is running and healthy

base_url.description: The base URL of the Personal AI Assistant API
